name: CBF Gamemode Toggle
description: Toggle CBF between platformer and classic

softtoggle.name: Disable
softtoggle.description: Soft toggle the mod; disable it without having to restart your game.

ToggleCBFInEditor.name: Force Mode in Editor
ToggleCBFInEditor.description: Allows you to force a certain cbf mode when you use the editor. Useful for playtesting levels

EditorMode.name: CBF Editor Mode
EditorMode.description: Allows you to change your cbf mode when entering the editor. It's probably a good practice to build levels without CBF.
